comments: Great professor and very helpful. I was nervous at first but she turned out to be great. I guess the student with the negative comment was one with an F on his/her transcript. If you do the work, it is an easy A.
It is unfair to say se did not help students. She was helpful, she was giving directions, her classes were over in number, and she uses all kind of tools to help students passing.

I agree with her easiness, but it is unfair to say she had not helped any students. The students were rude to her. I saw her last month teaches at Wayne state university. She helped students inside and outside the lectures and lab and was friendly to everyone.

I agree with her easiness, but it is unfair to say she had not helped any students. The students were rude to her because of her wearing Muslim Hijab and think that she is very young to teach. I saw her last month, she teaches at Wayne state university. She helped students inside and outside the lectures and lab and was friendly to everyone.

I think she did her best work to help students in lectures and office hours, but some students hated her because she was wearing Muslem hijab, or some of them did not study hard, she provided students with all help from tests guides to lecture outlines, her tests were from her straight lectures.

This teacher doesnt sometimes know what she is talking about. On her lectures all she does is read the outline and if u ask her a question she will just continue reading and will not answer your questions. She also failed everyone even the A students. They took her off the campus and now she is teaching at another campus. Dont take her!!!!!!
